title: Rose-Colored Memories (feat. Joe DeRosa, Luis J Gomez, Joe List & Justin Silver)
description: The gang ponders if Dan would end his sobriety in the zombie apocalypse. Joe List joins the show and tells stories about his drinking past and why they led him to becoming the sober comic he is today. Luis J. Gomez is all fired up with a bone to pick with Justin Silver. Jay, Christine and Joe DeRosa test positive for COVID-19 antibodies and Dan wants to be part of the club.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
